import React from "react"; import "./styles/recentTrades.css"; const RecentTrades = ({ recentTrades, formatDate, onRefresh }) => { const handleRefresh = () => { onRefresh(); }; return (

Recent Trades

{/* */} {/* */} {recentTrades.map((trade) => ( {/* */} ))}
IDDateSymbol Stock Price Type Strike PriceImplied Vol.Entry Price Exit Price Contracts Expiration Date
{trade.trade_id} {trade.option_symbol} ${trade.underlying_stock_price} {trade.option_type} ${trade.strike_price}{trade.implied_volatility * 100}%${trade.entry_price} {trade.exit_price ? `$${trade.exit_price}` : ""} {trade.contracts} {formatDate(trade.expiration_date)}
); }; export default RecentTrades; /* Additional: Total entry cost ($) first trim (50%) second trim (100%) total profit (%) total profit ($) */ /* strategy: AGGRESSIVE starting $500.00 trim: first trim (50%) second trim (100%) full position: 10 contracts if under $1.50 5 contracts if over $1.50 Enter: make analysis and alway enter 1/2 positions first. stop loss: NONE (aggressive trading) always letting 1 or 2 contracts exp. depending on initial cost and success of trade. */
